name: GGJ 2016: Ritual
description:
So here's my creation for GGJ 2016!

Bear in mind it's only a prototype and still has some fairly large bugs in there as well as lots of missing bits as such as simple controls and objectives. Never fear though as I'm planning to work on ironing out those problems in the coming days as well as polishing up the game as a whole. I was mostly really excited to get this game out there because I had a great time making it!

Let me know what you think!
